title: The Patchwork City
story_summary: Stenograd breaks apart as each district follows its own values and BCI rules. People celebrate new freedoms and local pride fills the streets. The Council loses control and dissolves. At last, the truth comes out - Halden built the system to give people real autonomy, not enforce total control.

official.headline: Festival Unites City
official.anchor_line: Stenograd celebrates the Festival of Differences as districts share art and tradition.
official.contextual_reframing: Demonstrating the resilience of our society, citizens enjoy new connections across diverse communities.

official.headline: Local Rules Adopted
official.anchor_line: Districts permanently adopt tailored BCI configurations reflecting unique values.
official.contextual_reframing: The system smoothly adjusts, empowering neighborhoods while ensuring access and harmony citywide.

official.headline: New Stenograd Emerges
official.anchor_line: Stenograd evolves into distinct value-based districts, each embracing its own path.
official.contextual_reframing: A future of self-determination and organized diversity begins as districts operate in cooperative balance.

underground.headline: Truth Goes Dark
underground.anchor_line: Council's grip slips as district feeds glitch - truth trickles through broken screens.
underground.contextual_reframing: People see through the silence. Leaked votes and council infighting spark questions about who really decides our lives.

underground.headline: Secrets Unsealed
underground.anchor_line: Whispers spread: Halden wanted local control. Now the system is cracking open.
underground.contextual_reframing: Not a technical hiccup - a rebellion in code. Even the old rules are being rewritten from the inside out.

underground.headline: Stenograd Breaks Free
underground.anchor_line: The Council dissolves. Districts claim autonomy. No more one city. Many voices now.
underground.contextual_reframing: What they called unity was control. Self-determination is finally ours - if we dare to keep it.
